product_name: Sawyer SAM Finger Splints - Package of 2
long_description: Helpful for minor backcountry sprains, the Sawyer SAM finger splints use soft aluminum alloy surrounded by foam to securely and comfortably immobilize the injured finger. Aluminum alloy core sandwiched between two layers of closed-cell foam; each splint is reusable. Includes 2 splints.
short_description: Helpful for minor backcountry sprains, the Sawyer SAM finger splints use soft aluminum alloy surrounded by foam to securely and comfortably immobilize the injured finger.
